channel.title: Brightcove Developer Product Updates
channel.generator: Feeder 2.3.9(2.3.9); Mac OS X Version 10.9 (Build 13A584) http://reinventedsoftware.com/feeder/

item.title: Dynamic Ingest API
item.author: rcrooks@brightcove.com ( Robert Crooks)
item.description: Brightcove's Dynamic Ingest (DI) API is based on functionality where video source files are downloaded from the customer's storage location and specified renditions of the source files are created. The platform is cloud-centric, globally-distributed and based on modern practices to deliver best in class consistency and speed.

item.title: CMS API (beta)
item.description: Brightcove's CMS API provides a programmatic way to create, update and access data for your Video Cloud videos. The CMS API is currently in beta and is not supported by Brightcove Support. If you would like access to the beta, please contact your Brightcove Account Manager.
item.author: rcrooks@brightcove.com ( Robert Crooks)
